column5: A month ago, I took my lady, my best friend to hospital and the diagnosis was pneumonia. She seemed to be improving for a couple of days but then she had a spell where she couldn't breathe. Ventilator, sedation and chopper flight to the Sault Area Hospital, much better, much newer facility. Cat-scan discovers Hodgkins Lymphoma. She's still hanging in there, has had a trachaeostomy and the doc is still confident they can knock this bug down. If they succeed, there'll be chemo and all kinds of hardships. Consequently, I'm not spending my time on the lake but travelling back and forth from here to the Sault. Sorry guys.
Sorry to hear that Bob, best of luck to your wife.
Forget apologies!!! Thoughts, prayers, best wishes for your lady Bob!!!!!
Exactly, no apology needed Bob.  Prayers and best wishes are sent!
Forget the apologies Bob, far more important things then fishing right now. (I'm not even in the tournament.) My thoughts, prayers, best wishes to your misses!!!!
X2 Bob... positive thoughts being sent your way... HH
Not a problem and good luck..  From your captain to you, get her better that will be your entry!!!    darren
Priorities are just that.  No need to apologize for anything.  Be a boss and beat that crap!
